name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 071
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By We All Gonna Make It. 5 Months and 71 pieces in and this project is still going strong and selling out quickly every drop. I think We All Gonna Make It!
